section.section: A person aggrieved by a regulation or order to pay wages that the Commissioner adopts under this subtitle may file a complaint in circuit court for the county within 60 days after the date of publication of the regulation or order to pay wages to have it modified or set aside.
A copy of the complaint shall be served on the Commissioner.

text.section: Unless the court specifically orders otherwise, the commencement of proceedings under this section may not operate as a stay of the regulation or order to pay wages.

section.section: The court shall determine whether a regulation or order to pay wages is in accordance with law.
If a finding of fact is supported by substantial evidence, the finding is conclusive.
